title: RC-300 Loop Station (Used)
description:
The big one! With three independent stereo channels, hours of loop memory and onboard effects, the RC-300 is as powerful as a DAW. The loop station features an XLR input with phantom power for recording microphones or acoustic instruments, and an auxiliary line input for recording audio from music players. You can save and export your loops as WAV files for further processing. Master this machine and you can be a band all on your own.

This used unit is in perfect condition. It includes the original power adapter.
